        public Runner runnerForClass(Class<?> each)
                      throws Throwable
        从类复制的说明: RunnerBuilder
        Override to calculate the correct runner for a test class at runtime.
        指定者:
        runnerForClass 在类中 RunnerBuilder
        参数:

        返回:
        a Runner
        抛出:
        Throwable - if a runner cannot be constructed
